title: calligraphic style font
content:
Don’t know if this is a custom job but I’m sure there should be something close to this at least. Thanks for your help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090912054808im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jameslai-01_5262.jpg)
author: kneckenbauer

comments.content: [James Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20090912054808/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fajardo/james-paul/) is the pro-version, the [beta of it is called James Fajardo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090912054808/http:/www.dafont.com/james-fajardo.font?text=James+Lai) is probably your font.
